subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Buffalo Bills released the injured tight end Kevin Everett in a move that will allow him to apply for disability benefits. Everett sustained a spine injury during a game last Sept. 9 against the Denver Broncos, and doctors initially said he would not walk again. But Everett, 26, has since regained some use of his arms and legs and is able to walk on his own.
